snippet: In their final game of the regular season, the Nets will be hoping to squeeze into the Eastern Conference’s final playoff spot. The Knicks could benefit from losing.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets retain distant hope of playoff contention if they can defeat the Orlando Magic in final game, but only if Indiana Pacers lose to the Memphis Grizzlies; New York Knicks, by contrast, could benefit from losing their final game, as it would give them chance to return to last-place status and give them greater chance of gaining No 1 draft pick.
lead_paragraph: In their final game of the regular season, the Nets will be hoping to squeeze into the Eastern Conference’s final playoff spot. The Knicks could benefit from losing.

headline.main: Suspense Goes Down to Wire for New York Teams
headline.print_headline: Suspense Goes Down to Wire for New York Teams
